meanings.sent1: The cytologists observed the tiny cells under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Many cytologists work in laboratories to understand how cells function.
meanings.sent3: The cytologists joked that they have a 'cell-fie' with the cells they study.
meanings.sent4: The world of cells unfolded before the cytologists like a captivating story.
meanings.sent5: In the world of science, cytologists are the detectives unraveling the mysteries of cells.

meanings.sent1: Learning about cytologists helps us understand the building blocks of life.
meanings.sent2: The course on cytologists covers topics like cell structure and function.
meanings.sent3: During the exam, the student's brain felt as complex as the field of cytologists.
meanings.sent4: The textbook on cytologists painted a vivid picture of the cellular world.
meanings.sent5: Exploring cytologists is like embarking on a fascinating journey into the microscopic realm.
